snippet: Mana Contemporary in Jersey City, part of the Moishe’s Moving and Storage empire, envisions itself as a full-service art center in a couple of years. Mana Contemporary in Jersey City, part of the Moishe’s Moving and Storage empire, envisions...
abstract: Mana Contemporary in Jersey City, NJ, part of the Moishe’s Moving and Storage empire, envisions itself as a full-service art center; 5,000-square-foot gallery is hoping to become arts destination, showcasing artists that can take advantage of its massive size and space.
lead_paragraph: Mana Contemporary in Jersey City, part of the Moishe’s Moving and Storage empire, envisions itself as a full-service art center in a couple of years. Mana Contemporary in Jersey City, part of the Moishe’s Moving and Storage empire, envisions itself as a full-service art center in a couple of years.

headline.main: From a Moving Van to an Arts Complex
headline.print_headline: From a Moving Van to an Arts Complex
